name: energysmart
0:
”Alexa open energy smart”
”Alexa start energy smart”
”energy smart”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: energy smart
Developer Terms of Use
des:
If you have any problem when you use this skill, you can contact us with email: support@gendome.com. Amazon alexa and Gendome energy smart home products work together to help you control Gendome devices nice and easy.

You can simply ask Alexa to turn on, turn off or set.There's no need to go to the switch to adjust your device, just talk to Alexa on your Amazon Echo, Echo Dot, Amazon Tap or Echo Show.

Connec Alexa to your Gendome devices in a few simple steps：
1. Download "Gendome" app in Google Play or App Store;
2. Register your Gendome account in your "Gendome" app.
3. You need to have some Gendome devices in hand;
4. Configure these devices in your Gendome app and change nick name for your devices which will be used in this skill;
5. Download Amazon Alexa app in Google Play or App Store;
6. In Gendome app "Mine", click Amazon Alexa logo under Third-party voice service, then click "Authorize now" to finish authorazation.

Then you can enjoy the voice control like these:
"Alexa, turn on/off deviceNickname light."
"Alexa, set deviceNickname light color to blue."
"Alexa, turn on/off deviceNickname buzzer."
"Alexa, turn on/off the discharge switch to deviceNickname."
"Alexa, turn on/off the D C switch to deviceNickname."
"Alexa, Set the charge power on deviceNickname to minimum/maximum."
"Alexa, Set the screen sleep time on deviceNickname to 2."
"Alexa, Set the screen sleep time on deviceNickname to always on."
"Alexa, Set the discharge timeout on deviceNickname to 1."
"Alexa, Set the discharge timeout on deviceNickname to always on."
Currently this skill supports products: Home 3000, Home 3600.
